title: Universe/Frames/DirVelocity
description: Configuration for DirVelocity directions in frames plugin (i.e. direction from origin to target velocities in given axes)

origin.description: Name of the origin point in frames

target.description: Name of the target point in frames

axes.description: Name of the axes in frames

order.description: Optional order of the derivative to use (default 1 for velocity)
